Articles.Content: Does anyone know of good mods that have real life rovers like opportunity? And satellites like Hubble, mainly looking for bubble space telescope and the opportunity Mars rover.

(Of course IMO) Near Future Exploration (essential), Restock/Restock+ (essential, sat visual overhaul, rover part visual overhaul and 1 new wheel), RLA reborn (for the mini RTG) Near Future Electrical (for the big RTG and capacitators and more batteries), SCANSAT (for scanner parts, even if you don't scan, these parts look cool on your ships), Spacedust (for Hubble/Bubble/Kubble/...) Sadly I don't really know restockalike rover mods that add oppoturnity-like or curiosity-like rovers, but you can build them probably with restock/+ and BG (if you have it, for extending solar panels)

17 hours ago, Starhelperdude said:

(Of course IMO) Near Future Exploration (essential), Restock/Restock+ (essential, sat visual overhaul, rover part visual overhaul and 1 new wheel), RLA reborn (for the mini RTG) Near Future Electrical (for the big RTG and capacitators and more batteries), SCANSAT (for scanner parts, even if you don't scan, these parts look cool on your ships), Spacedust (for Hubble/Bubble/Kubble/...) Sadly I don't really know restockalike rover mods that add oppoturnity-like or curiosity-like rovers, but you can build them probably with restock/+ and BG (if you have it, for extending solar panels)

Thank you
